remarks: Alternate definition for the commutes relation.  Lemma 3 of [Kalmbach] p. 23.  ( ~ cmbr3 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cmtbr2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cmtbr2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cmtbr2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cmtbr2.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
cmtbr2.c $e |- C = ( cm ` K ) $.
cmtbr3N $p |- ( ( K e. OML /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X C Y <-> ( X ./\ ( ( ._|_ ` X ) .\/ Y ) ) = ( X ./\ Y ) ) ) $.
